thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com | 4 of 69
thread.title: Phil G
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Phil G

author: Phil G
title: Phil G
text: I have only had the whole house system running for 6 days, but when I called about a couple very minor water leaks, they answered promptly and gave me good advice. Two of the leaks stopped using their suggestion. The other will take time. The instruction manual, though very good fails to mention using pipe dope then teflon wrap over the pipe dope on the 1" threaded connection of the cartridge filter. The problem according to an engineer, (not related to Pelican), is the quality of the fittings not the Pelican hardware.
